bibl.title: Transcendant Drinking: The Symposium at Sea Reconsidered.
bibl.note: The sympotic ship and the ship of state, as in Theognis and Alcaeus (in part. fr. 208 Campbell), should be seen as interrelated figures of sympotic discourse, representing parallel images of community.
CORNER Sean, Transcendant Drinking: The Symposium at Sea Reconsidered.
